betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oUse the unfathomatoble breaker to open the unfathomatoble gate in the deep dark.

§fIt is no mystery that there are periods of testificate history they themselves regret, but I may have stumbled into something that was traight up erased from their annals.
The core of the bewitched arts revolves around demonology, and pacts, and yet, this specific pact was forgotten, or hidden.
The testificates, from what I have seen, have always been aware of the existence of Dimensional Shards, and yet none of them appeared to want to use their powers.
At some point in their history, though, long before the invasions, someone on Terra tried to get access to the power of Shards, and they brought forth a demon to obtain the knowledge to use them.
The riddles of the beast were unclear, but a name was clearly spoken. The Arbiter.
